product_name: Gear Aid Quick-Attach Tension Lock Buckle
long_description: When webbing straps need adjusting, you need a versatile buckle to get the job done right! The Gear Aid Quick-Attach tension lock buckle lets you loosen or tighten straps for quick pack adjustments. High-quality, 1 in. ladderlock offers a no-sew replacement for a damaged or missing tension lock. Includes 2 tension locks.
short_description: When webbing straps need adjusting, you need a versatile buckle to get the job done right! The Gear Aid Quick-Attach tension lock buckle lets you loosen or tighten straps for quick pack adjustments.
